column1: Master of Science in Health Informatics and Analytics
column2: The University of the Commonwealth Caribbean (UCC)
column5: Rapid advances in technology have revolutionized many aspects of the health care industry, including the way health data is recorded, secured, and shared. The industry-wide implementation of electronic health records has increased access to information which is improving the quality, safety, and efficiency of health care. With your Master of Science in Health Informatics and Analytics degree from the  University of the Commonwealth Caribbean Global Campus (UCCGC)  , you will gain the knowledge to help health professionals provide optimal care.
